climbs.name: Real steel
climbs.fa: Jim Voss, Bill Holder, Rich Hover and Kaylee Voss

content.description: Climb fun crack to small ledge w/ bush. Continue up crack as it gets wider, moving up and right to anchors as you exit crack.
content.protection: 2 bolt anchor, standard rack, #4-#5 helpful, #6 optional
content.location: Anchors on wall behind Igor / burlap. Can reach anchors via walk up or traverse from sport anchors.

climbs.name: Lil Wide
climbs.fa: Unknown; Greg Sidberry and Christina Douglas 06/21

content.description: Follow crack up and slightly left as it goes thru 2 wider sections, second of which is short offwidth / chimney. Top out at comfortable ledge. Many face options or enjoy the jams.
content.protection: 2 bolt anchor. Standard rack, #4 and #5 handy, optional #6
content.location: Left most crack, left of / next to real steel ( crack with bush)

climbs.name: Igor's Corner
climbs.fa: Jim Voss, Bill Holder, Rich Hover and Kaylee Voss

content.description: Climb corner crack to face. Follow thinner right crack in chimney like features to top, w a mix of face and stemming options to top
content.location: Corner crack to the left of Igor

climbs.name: Igor
climbs.fa: Jim Voss, Bill Holder, Rich Hover and Kaylee Voss

content.description:
Whooee them anchors are funny! Clipped them off a heel but you can also push past them for a big hold behind the bolts.

Topo calls it 11b which is fair. Crux off the deck up to the second bolt. Then it’s all nice jugs and juglets on bomber rock. Gently overhung the whole way through.
content.location: Right from the Four Eyes Crag.

climbs.name: Burlap
climbs.fa: Jim Voss, Bill Holder, Rich Hover and Kaylee Voss

content.description:
Assuming wall to the right is on given the grade, though climbed without it easily enough using the edges and pieces along the arete on the left face.

That said, high first bolt so used the rock on the right to climb up and clip the first bolt, then started from the ground climbing per above. Overall a funky climb that’s not at the same quality level as many other routes in the Cove.
